translations.confirmCourseCreationContent: Are you sure you want to publish this course now? Registration will be available to students from the moment the course opens.
translations.confirmCourseEnrolmentContent: Are you sure you want to enroll in this course now?
translations.confirmJoiningUserGroupContent: Are you sure you want to join this group now?
translations.confirmUserGroupCreationContent: Are you sure you want to create this user group? People will be able to join it as soon as it is created.
translations.errorCannotEnrollInCourse: You cannot enroll in this course
translations.errorCannotSignUpForGroup: You cannot sign up for this group
translations.errorConnectionToServerFailed: Connection to the server failed, check your network connection and try again later
translations.errorInvalidLanguageCode: Language code is invalid or unsupported
translations.errorUnexpectedServerError: Unexpected server error occurred, try again later
translations.forbiddenPageSubtitle: I have to stop you right there. You are not authorized to perform this action. Follow the button to safely return to the application.
translations.goBackToApp: Go back to Bear in Mind
translations.name: Name
translations.notFoundPageSubtitle: Don't worry! Put your paw on the button and we'll take you back to the app.
translations.notFoundPageTitle: Hello little bear, are you lost?
